segments.text: Is that the latest issue of Reader you're reading ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it is . It has some really good articles in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I have been a subscriber for the past two years .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know that . How much does it cost to subscribe ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not exactly sure , but it's not that expensive at all .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I used to subscribe to it , but I cancelled my subscription last year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was the only person in my family reading it . Everyone in my family just likes to read Fashion .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's the same in my family . The coffee table in my living room is covered with copies of Fashion .
segments.speaker: S1
